phrase: I could really go for a sandwich right about now...
I think my tummy just grumbled!
Did you forget to feed me?
Can I have little a salami, for snack?
I could really go for some chicken vindaloo
Can I have cotton candy for dinner?
Can I have some carrots? They're good for your vision.
I need some protein! Gotta bulk up.
I need some salmon to maintain my shine
I'm hungry enough to eat a dog treat...
